description: Detects suspicious new RUN key element pointing to an executable in a suspicious folder Author: Florian Roth, Markus Neis, Sander Wiebing. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Software using weird folders for updates
name: New RUN Key Pointing to Suspicious Folder
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run\\* OR *\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\RunOnce\\*)) AND (winlog.event_data.Details:(*C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\* OR *C\:\\$Recycle.bin\\* OR *C\:\\Temp\\* OR *C\:\\Users\\Public\\* OR *C\:\\Users\\Default\\* OR *C\:\\Users\\Desktop\\* OR *\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\*) OR winlog.event_data.Details:(%Public%\\* OR wscript* OR cscript*)))
